kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=AddData, url=http://thetestingworldapi.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Post On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://thetestingworldapi.com/api/studentsDetails path_url=/api/studentsDetails headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '94'} body=b'{"first_name": "Testing", "middle_name": "A", "date_of_birth": "12/10/2021", "last_name": "B"}'

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
